entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 90
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
